section.heading: Rulemaking authority.
section.text: On or before December 1, 2007, the Office of the Chief Tenant Advocate shall promulgate rules, subject to Council approval, to implement the provisions of this chapter.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Oct. 1, 2007, D.C. Law 16-181, § 2(g), 53 DCR 6703

annoGroup.heading: Effective Dates
annoGroup.annotation: Section 5 of D.C. Law 16-181 provided: “Section 2 through 4 shall apply as of October 1, 2007.”
